giantmetalbowserFileIO
Class EasyFileWriter

java.lang.Object
  giantmetalbowserFileIO.EasyFileWriter

public class EasyFileWriter
extends java.lang.Object

A class for writing to files. It's simple. Create an EasyFileWriter from a String pathname, and then use the write(String) method. Example:

EasyFileWriter writer = new EasyFileWriter("Document.txt");
writer.write("This is the text in the document.");

Author:
giantmetalbowser
